DOC.brief_summary: This research project is a study to immunology changes in critically ill patients with severe sepsis by using Endotoxin Activity Assay (EAA) combined with Polymyxin-B Hemoperfusion.
DOC.brief_title: The Pilot Study of the Efficacy of Polymyxin-B Hemoperfusion in Critically Ill Patients With Severe Sepsis
DOC.criteria: SIRS Criteria > or = 2 meets definition Source of infection > or = 1 meet definition Evidence of organ dysfunction > or = 1 meet definition WBC < 5,000 /ul Platelet < 30,000 / ul Pregnancy woman Advance stage cancer patients (terminally ill) who is refuse to be resuscitated Received blood transfusion > 5 units in 24 hrs Allergy to PolymyxinB High risk and uncontrolled bleeding Organ transplant patients On immunosuppressive agents within 2 weeks before study HIV infection
